document.discussion_title: Drake to play Philips Arena Aug. 25
document.topic_text:
Drake to play Philips Arena Aug. 25 Greg Rossino, WXIA 2:26 PM. GMT April 25, 2016 INDIANAPOLIS, IN - FEBRUARY 03: Rapper Drake performs at ESPN The Magazine's "NEXT" Event on February 3, 2012 in Indianapolis, Indiana. (Photo by Theo Wargo/Getty Images for ESPN) (Photo: Theo Wargo, 2012 Getty Images) CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN GOOGLE+ PINTEREST ATLANTA - Drizzy is coming back to the ATL. Monday morning, Drake announced the "Summer Sixteen Tour" and with it a date at Philips Arena on Thursday, August 25. The Future and "special guests" will be on tour with the Grammy Award-winning artists as well. American Express card members can purchase tickets before the general public beginning Tuesday, April 26 at 10:00 a.m. through Thursday, April 28 at 10:00 p.m. Tickets go on sale starting April 29 through the Live Nation mobile app and at www.livenation.com . This will be Drakes first appearance in Atlanta since last September when he performed at Music Midtown 2015.
(© 2016 WXIA) Loading... LOS ANGELES, CA - JUNE 26: Rapper Drake performs onstage during the BET Awards '11 held at the Shrine Auditorium on June 26, 2011 in Los Angeles, California. (Photo by Kevin Winter/Getty Images) Kevin Winter, 2011 Getty Images LOS ANGELES, CA - NOVEMBER 20: Rapper Drake performs onstage at the 2011 American Music Awards held at Nokia Theatre L.A. LIVE on November 20, 2011 in Los Angeles, California. (Photo by Kevork Djansezian/Getty Images) Kevork Djansezian, 2011 Getty Images NEW YORK, NY - AUGUST 25: Drake performs onstage during the 2013 MTV Video Music Awards at the Barclays Center on August 25, 2013 in the Brooklyn borough of New York City. (Photo by Neilson Barnard/Getty Images for MTV) Neilson Barnard, 2013 Getty Images INDIO, CA - APRIL 12: Rapper Drake performs onstage during day 3 of the 2015 Coachella Valley Music & Arts Festival (Weekend 1) at the Empire Polo Club on April 12, 2015 in Indio, California. (Photo by Christopher Polk/Getty Images for Coachella) Christopher Polk, 2015 Getty Images NEW YORK, NY - DECEMBER 31: Rapper Drake performs on stage during New Year's Eve 2012 With Carson Daly in Times Square on December 31, 2011 in New York City. (Photo by Neilson Barnard/Getty Images) Neilson Barnard, 2011 Getty Images NEW YORK, NY - AUGUST 25: Drake performs during the 2013 MTV Video Music Awards at the Barclays Center on August 25, 2013 in the Brooklyn borough of New York City. (Photo by Rick Diamond/Getty Images for MTV) Rick Diamond, 2013 Getty Images NEW YORK, NY - OCTOBER 28: Singer/rapper Drake performs at Barclays Center on October 28, 2013 in New York City. (Photo by Stephen Lovekin/Getty Images) Stephen Lovekin, 2013 Getty Images INDIO, CA - APRIL 12: Rapper Drake performs onstage during day 3 of the 2015 Coachella Valley Music & Arts Festival (Weekend 1) at the Empire Polo Club on April 12, 2015 in Indio, California. (Photo by Kevin Winter/Getty Images for Coachella) Kevin Winter, 2015 Getty Images LAS VEGAS, NV - JANUARY 01: Recording artist Drake performs at The Joint inside the Hard Rock Hotel & Casino January 1, 2012 in Las Vegas, Nevada. (Photo by Ethan Miller/Getty Images) Ethan Miller, 2012 Getty Images LOS ANGELES, CA - JULY 16: Host Drake performs onstage during the 2014 ESPYS at Nokia Theatre L.A. Live on July 16, 2014 in Los Angeles, California. (Photo by Kevin Winter/Getty Images) Kevin Winter, 2014 Getty Images of
